name: saveit-now
title: Saveit.now
description: Save and manage bookmarks with SaveIt.now
author: Melvynx

commands.name: save-current-clipboard-url
commands.title: Save Current Clipboard URL
commands.description: Will save the current clipboard URL inside SaveIt.now

commands.name: add-an-url-to-bookmarks
commands.title: Add an URL to Bookmarks
commands.description: Form with URL box to add an URL inside the bookmark.

commands.name: list-the-bookmarks
commands.title: List the Bookmarks
commands.description: A search bar where we can search anything and list the bookmark

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: SaveIt.now API Key
preferences.description: Your SaveIt.now API key. Get it from: https://saveit.now/account/keys

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
